    org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common  

    • Uses of CSSStyledText in org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common

      Method parameters in org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common with type arguments of type CSSStyledText 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Iterable<String> BrailleTranslator.FromStyledTextToBraille.transform(Iterable<CSSStyledText> styledText) 
      default BrailleTranslator.LineIterator BrailleTranslator.LineBreakingFromStyledText.transform(Iterable<CSSStyledText> styledText)
      Transform a sequence of CSSStyledText to braille, in the form of a BrailleTranslator.LineIterator, which is an interface for laying out text into lines.
      BrailleTranslator.LineIterator AbstractBrailleTranslator.util.DefaultLineBreaker.transform(Iterable<CSSStyledText> text, int from, int to) 
      Iterable<String> BrailleTranslator.FromStyledTextToBraille.transform(Iterable<CSSStyledText> styledText, int from, int to) 
      BrailleTranslator.LineIterator BrailleTranslator.LineBreakingFromStyledText.transform(Iterable<CSSStyledText> styledTextWithContext, int from, int to)
      Transform the part of the input sequence between index from (included) and index to (not included).
      protected abstract AbstractBrailleTranslator.util.DefaultLineBreaker.BrailleStream AbstractBrailleTranslator.util.DefaultLineBreaker.translateAndHyphenate(Iterable<CSSStyledText> text, int from, int to)
      This method MUST translate to braille (the result may contain only braille characters and white space) and perform line breaking within words (hyphenate).
